alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued May 23 at 10:11AM EDT until May 23 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents expected. * WHERE...Georgia Beaches. * WHEN...From 8 AM EDT this morning through this evening. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong north to south long shore current will also occur.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh
